Unlimited instore cryptohashes Unlimited Instore receipt submission Unlimited crypto hashes on daily deals Unlimited crypto hashes on top up & prepaid cards Unlimited free meals (save up to £36 per use) and 50% off food bills at our offers partners restaurants 10% Bonus crypto hashes on all online purchases Go plus and maximise your savings
We know you love Beeone but you can take it to another level when you Go Plus! \n\n
For just £9.99 a month you’ll join tens of thousands of Go Plus members who qualify for up to 50% off their bills at close to 10,000 restaurants throughout the UK and Ireland.
\n\n Including all these amazing brands:
You’ll also receive a whopping 10% more cryptohashes than other Beeone users do every time you collect cryptohashes online.
Go Plus today and we will add £5 to your cryptohashes balance, letting you try it for the next month totally risk free. 761750217637
Choose a Category Include Some Detials Review Your Detials
>
By selecting a card, entering your CVV (3 digit security code) and clicking Go+ you agree to the following Terms and Conditions of Go Plus membership.
\n\n
We will debit £9.99 today from your selected card and every 30 days from today..\n\n
Although there are no contracts and you can cancel Go plus at any time, in the unlikely event that you cancel Go Plus at some point in the future, you understand that no refunds are given for part months already paid.\n\n
Unless stated otherwise, always assume you must call restaurants and book a table in advance quoting our “Gourmet Society”offer in order to claim 50% off.\n\n
Restaurant offers in Go Plus are discounts at the point of sale and not cryptohashes.\n\n
You must show your digital card from this website, IOS or Android app in order to access a restaurant offer. You can find the card on this site by clicking on the merchant.

By signing this Agreement, I confirm that:
\n\n
I understand that I am entering into a legally binding contract formed by this Application, the Terms and Conditions, website privacy policies and the Distributor Agreement, Marketing Plan, Virtual Office Agreement and other associated documents, and that I have received a copy of, read, understood, and agree to each of these documents; All information provided by me to Bee One with this application is accurate and complete; If I am an individual, I am 18 years of age or older; Neither the Applicant nor the Applicant’s spouse/life partner has had an interest or benefit in an Bee One distributorship in the 12 months before the Effective Date. \n\n
I expressly authorise the Bee One to prepare and issue invoices to me and agree that invoices will be generated electronically and will be made available to me by electronic means only.
\n\n
Bee One UK LTD is the promoter of this trading scheme. This trading scheme offers online products and services and other products supplied by Bee One UK LTD as mentioned in the Beeone distributor terms and conditions mentioned above. Sales of these products and services are made via Independent Representatives who participate in the trading scheme as order-takers. The only financial obligation of a Beeone Independent Distributor during the 12-month term of this Agreement is the payment of the virtual office fee. There are no further financial obligations and, in particular, no obligation to purchase product or services from Bee One. The Bee One distributor participates in this trading scheme subject to the terms of this Agreement and at such level of the scheme as the individual may achieve.
\n\n
You have the right to withdraw from this Agreement, without giving us a reason, for 14 days after it is concluded. This is called the “Withdrawal Period”. To exercise your right of withdrawal, you must inform us of your decision in writing before the Withdrawal Period expires by contacting Bee-One UK LTD. If you withdraw, Bee One will reimburse any payment received from You within 14 days from the date on which You inform us of your decision. BeeOne will reimburse You using the same means of payment that You used to pay us, unless you and we agree otherwise. See the Terms and Conditions for more information. Cancellation must be submitted in writing to Bee-One UK LTD, 1A, Floor 33, 25 Canada Square, Citi Group Centre, Canary Wharf, London, England, E14 5LB or support@beeone.co.uk
\n\n
When considering or comparing business opportunities, You should be aware that it is illegal for a promoter or participant in a trading scheme to persuade anyone to make a payment by promising benefits from getting others to join a scheme. Do not be misled by claims that high earnings are easily achieved.
\n\n
Yes, I wish to become a Beeone Independent Distributor. I understand that clicking the Accept and Submit button acts as my signature.

Where does it come from? Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random text. It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years old. Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur, from a Lorem Ipsum passage, and going through the cites of the word in classical literature, discovered the undoubtable source. Lorem Ipsum comes from sections 1.10.32 and 1.10.33 of "de Finibus Bonorum et Malorum" (The Extremes of Good and Evil) by Cicero, written in 45 BC. This book is a treatise on the theory of ethics, very popular during the Renaissance. The first line of Lorem Ipsum, "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..", comes from a line in section 1.10.32. The standard chunk of Lorem Ipsum used since the 1500s is reproduced below for those interested.
